sys_script.name: Update event trigger Business Rules

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_acc682dc47f54a10abf1d9ca516d4384
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_snc_ebis_configuration</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="x_snc_ebis_configuration">direction=out^EQ<item display_value="Outbound" endquery="false" field="direction" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="out"/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Update event trigger Business Rules</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	const businessRuleUtil = new BusinessRuleUtil();
	const configuration = new ConfigurationUtil(current);

	configuration.getActions(true).forEach(function(action) {
		businessRuleUtil.insertOrUpdateEventQueueTrigger(
			configuration.getBusinessRuleName(action),
			configuration.getTableName(),
			configuration.isActive(),
			action,
			configuration.getEventName(action),
			configuration.getOptions()
		);
	});
	
	configuration.getActions(false).forEach(function(action) {
		businessRuleUtil.delete(
			configuration.getBusinessRuleName(action),
			configuration.getTableName()
		);
	});

})(current, previous);
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>david.van.damme</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-04-22 08:44:48</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>acc682dc47f54a10abf1d9ca516d4384</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Update event trigger Business Rules</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Event Based Instance Synchronizer" source="x_snc_ebis">beaac464472d8210cf10815a516d43d9</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Event Based Instance Synchronizer">beaac464472d8210cf10815a516d43d9</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_acc682dc47f54a10abf1d9ca516d4384</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>david.van.damme</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-04-22 08:46:17</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=acc682dc47f54a10abf1d9ca516d4384"/></record_update>
